title: Looper
creator_credit: TriStar Pictures, Ram Bergman Productions, Endgame Entertainment, DMG Entertainment, FilmDistrict, Ed Verreaux, Sharen Davis, James D. Stern, Rian Johnson and Ram Bergman
headline_credit: China and United States of America, 2012
brief_description: In the futuristic action thriller Looper, time travel will be invented but it will be illegal and only available on the black market, where the mob uses it to send hitmen into the past to assassinate targets.

constellations_other.name: Obviously the time continuum has been disrupted...again and again and again!
constellations_other.description: Eadweard Muybridge was able to capture time and play it back again creating endless time paradoxes where subjects are destined to repeat their previous actions. Filmmakers have since explored such notions via time travel narratives questioning destiny, fate and choice.

creator_credit_for_label: TriStar Pictures, Ram Bergman Productions, Endgame Entertainment, DMG Entertainment, FilmDistrict, Ed Verreaux, Sharen Davis, James D. Stern, Rian Johnson and Ram Bergman
description: In the futuristic action thriller Looper, time travel will be invented but it will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a looper, a hired gun, like Joe is waiting to mop up. Joe is getting rich and life is good until the day the mob decides to close the loop, sending back Joe’s future self for assassination.
description_for_label: In the futuristic action thriller Looper, time travel will be invented but it will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a looper, a hired gun, like Joe is waiting to mop up. Joe is getting rich and life is good until the day the mob decides to close the loop, sending back Joe’s future self for assassination.
